name: The Midnight
description:
'''The Midnight''' is an American [[Synthwave (2000s genre)|synthwave]] band composed of [[Atlanta]]-based singer-songwriter Tyler Lyle and [[Portland, Oregon|Portland]]–based Danish producer, songwriter, and singer Tim McEwan.

The band's motto is "{{lang|ja-Latn|[[mono no aware]]}}" ({{lang|ja|物の哀れ}}), a Japanese phrase that loosely translates to "a sense of nostalgic wistfulness and the awareness that nothing lasts forever".
